00046 //
00047 //! complete l'iterateur et l'evaluateur
00048 
00049 void Op_Conv_Quick_VDF_Face::associer(const Zone_dis& zone_dis,
00050                                       const Zone_Cl_dis& zone_cl_dis,
00051                                       const Champ_Inc& ch_vit)
00052 {
00053   const Zone_VDF& zvdf = ref_cast(Zone_VDF,zone_dis.valeur());
00054   const Zone_Cl_VDF& zclvdf = ref_cast(Zone_Cl_VDF,zone_cl_dis.valeur());
00055   const Champ_Face& vit = ref_cast(Champ_Face,ch_vit.valeur());
00056 
00057   iter.associer(zvdf, zclvdf, *this);
00058 
00059   Eval_Quick_VDF_Face& eval_conv = (Eval_Quick_VDF_Face&) iter.evaluateur();
00060   eval_conv.associer_zones(zvdf, zclvdf );          //!< Evaluateur_VDF::associer_zones
00061   eval_conv.associer_inconnue(vit);        //!< Eval_VDF_Face::associer_inconnue
00062   if (Process::nproc()>1 && zvdf.zone().nb_joints() && zvdf.zone().joint(0).epaisseur()<2)
00063     {
00064       Cerr << "Overlapping width (given by larg_joint option) of  " << zvdf.zone().joint(0).epaisseur() << finl;
00065       Cerr << "is not enough for Quick scheme in VDF parallel calculation." << finl;
00066       Cerr << "Please, partition your mesh with an overlapping width of 2 with larg_joint option." << finl;
00067       Process::exit();
00068     }
00069 }
00070 
00071 const Champ_Inc_base& Op_Conv_Quick_VDF_Face::vitesse() const
00072 {
00073   Eval_Quick_VDF_Face& eval_conv = (Eval_Quick_VDF_Face&) iter.evaluateur();
00074   return eval_conv.vitesse();
00075 }
00076 
00077 Champ_Inc_base& Op_Conv_Quick_VDF_Face::vitesse()
00078 {
00079   Eval_Quick_VDF_Face& eval_conv = (Eval_Quick_VDF_Face&) iter.evaluateur();
00080   return eval_conv.vitesse();
00081 }
